{{Notability|film|date=February 2010}} {{Infobox film | name = Zombie Night | image = Zombie Night 2.jpg | caption = DVD Cover for ''Zombie Night 2: Awakening'' | director = [[David J. Francis]] | producer = [[David J. Francis]]
Mike Masters | writer = Mike Masters | starring = Sharon DeWitt
Kari Grace
Dan Rooney | music = Roman Zebik | cinematography = Robert Scarborough | editing = Chris Bellio | distributor = Last Call Productions | released = 28 October [[2006 in film|2006]] | runtime = 90 minutes | country = [[Canada]] | language = English | preceded by = ''[[Zombie Night]]'' | followed by = ''[[Reel Zombies]]'' }} '''''Zombie Night 2 : Awakening''''' is a [[2006 in film|2006]] [[Canada|Canadian]] [[horror film]] film, the movie is the sequel to ''[[Zombie Night]]'' and was another time directed from [[David J. Francis]]. == Plot == The death is the beginning, all the humanity left, when the night begins, comes the undead. A simple [[Mosquito]] bite infected with a virus has spread death, from the humid rain forest. The virus came to civilization, with a mortality rate of one hundred percent[http://www.moviesonline.ca/film1902.htm Awakening: Zombie Night 2 Movie - MoviesOnline!]. Always on the lookout for new victims, the Lethal [[Mosquito]] virus is forgotten. The time of the human race is running out[http://www.quietearth.us/articles/2008/02/04/Review-of-Awakening-Zombie-Night-2 Review of Awakening: Zombie Night 2 - quietearth.us]. == Cast == * Steve Curtis - Keith * Sharon DeWitt - Shelley * Dan Rooney - Basil * Kari Grace -Crystal * Johnny Paris - Derek * Bob Hillhouse - Pascal * Nick Smith - Saul * Lise Moule - Crazy * Sarah-Jean Villa - Vikki * Mark Parr - Logan * Dana McArdle - Eli * Jessica Pickles - Hailey * [[Tony Watt]] - Jay * [[David J. Francis]] - Father * Ryan Gallant - Zombie * John Bell - Andrew == Production == The Movie was filmed to the turn of the year in Desoronto, Ontario.[http://www.quietearth.us/articles/2008/02/04/Review-of-Awakening-Zombie-Night-2 Review of Awakening: Zombie Night 2 - Quiet Earth] == Release == In Germany was the movie released with the official Soundtrack of the movie on a bonus CD on 29 October 2007[http://movies.music-discovery.de/2009/07/zombie-night-ii-dvd-review-oder-auf-englisch-awakening-genannt/ Zombie Night II â DVD-Review, oder auf Englisch âAwakeningâ genannt]. == Sequel == In 2008 the second sequel was produced, the movie "Reel Zombies" talks about in a time of real zombies[http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=5769875476 Reel Zombies - Facebook]. ==See Also== * [[List of zombie films]] ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == *{{Imdb title|0473738}} *[http://awakening.primalfilms.com/main/index.html Official Site] [[Category:Comedy horror films]] [[Category:2000s horror films]] [[Category:2006 films]] [[Category:Canadian horror films]] [[Category:English-language films]] [[Category:Zombie films]] {{2000s-horror-film-stub}} [[de:Zombie Night II]]
